website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you like Fancy Feast but prefer to feed your cat dry food – it appeals to most cats just like the canned varieties.
pros: A crunchy gourmet kibble that has similar appeal to most felines as the canned recipes
Cat owners have reported that their pets won't eat any other dry kibble brand after tasting it
cons: A bit on the higher end of the price range compared to similar kibble from competing brands

customer_reviews.title: Like Crack for Cats
customer_reviews.text: As my cat gets older (12 years old now), it has only ever liked eating this particular brand of food and won't touch anything else. I've tried giving her alternative brands or even mixes from Purina itself (e.g. one with vegetable blend) and it won't touch it. Now that it's older, it demands a mix of this and the Purina canned food (chicken & beef) mixed in with together otherwise it refuses to eat. Certainly a spoiled cat as far as what it chooses to eat but I think that's because Purina puts some kind of cat equivalent of crack in their food. ;)
customer_reviews.author: 5150 Joker

customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that I would receive 4 packets of cat food. I only received 1 for $15! I am livid!! The descript was Four (4) 16 Oz. Bag - Purina Fancy Feast With Ocean Fish & Salmon And Accents Of Garden Greens Dry Cat Food 100% Complete And Balanced Nutrition Real Seafood Flavors That Cats Adore Essential Vitamins And Minerals Help Support Her Health Lightly Cooked And Basted To A Delicious, Delicately Crunchy Finish
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast dry cat food
customer_reviews.text: I have 9-cats and there's not one that doesn't love Fancy Feast. I buy 6-different brands of other dry cat food, and it's ALWAYS Fancy Feast that is eaten up before the other brands. I feed feral colonies and it's a wee bit too expensive to give 50-cats just Fancy Feast alone; which is why I also buy other brands as well. Fancy Feast comes in a purple, deep-pink, and green bag...each bag a flavor of it's own. Your cats will LOVE this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats must have meat, also
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite as it's coated with digestive enzymes that cats love. But cats are 'obligate carnivores' which must have meat as their very short digestive tract organs are bunched together; a lion's digestive tract is 6' long and a deer's is 30' (ours is 19') and like all carnivores, cats sleep longer than non-carnivores. Twice a day in a stainless steel bowl, I give my cat 3 different tablespoons of meaty cat food and some of this product, but not much; once she starts eating, like all of us, she gets a hunger boost from her system that keeps her eating the meat she doesn't like so much, but which is best for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: One of our FOUR cats (yah I know...we love the little suckers) stopped eating. He just STOPPED, and it's a good thing my wife was paying very close attention, because he got sick quickly. The vet suggested Fancy Feast, and I don't recall why. This cat wouldn't eat ANYTHING ELSE. We dried a few different foods, including "wet" ones from a can. This flavor of Fancy Feast was the only thing he wanted...and as it turns out ALL of our cats wanted it! It's small and seems to digest easily because we have a lot less PUKING than before. The cats love it, and they seem healthy and this stuff doesn't cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: dry food make our cat sick, moist food is good
customer_reviews.text: I am to late to return this item. The cats love this dry food. I noticed that my cats hair became uneven and have split ends. I have never see that before. I thought if the moist food is good so dry food is good too. Not the case. I bought a bag for my sisters cat, and her cat love it, but got more sick then mine and ended up at the vet emergency. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: barbd

customer_reviews.title: Mold is in.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product before and it was good. But this time I got this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Switch amount of amount of packs...
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered it said (4) packs of this product I only got one pack, I complained about it and they sent me only one more pack, I have left it at that but still very unhappy with the switch that took place!!! There is no way I would pay that much go one or even two packs of cat food!!! I love Amazon on but you get an F- on this one!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: My Cat is Hooked on This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could replicate Fancy Feast's recipe because my cat loves anything from that company, including the dry food and the appetizers. It's not the highest quality cat food out there but I need it because she won't eat the grain-free, healthier stuff without it. I have to mix the two together, and then she'll eat it. She is so spoiled but what can you do? My cat tells me what she likes, and I do it.
customer_reviews.author: VIDFAN

customer_reviews.title: El Switcho El Chango
customer_reviews.text: When i opened it i realized this looked and smells just like my friskies seafood sensations there just shaped differantly but the fancy feast cost way more and you get less of it. Thank you Purina the jokes on me
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Surf and turf - what cat wouldn't like it for dinner?
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a fan of all the Fancy Feast products I've offered her and this was no exception. I give her about 1/8 cup per day with her regular Purina One Indoor dry cat food and she wolfs it down whereas she is more restrained when given just the regular food. I confess I show my love for her by buying high quality food but why not. I restrict the amount of food she gets so she maintains a healthy weight but is tempting to give her more just to show how much I love living with her .... but I do not cause I want her to stay trim.
customer_reviews.author: S. Randon

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My cat is the finickiest eater you will ever meet. She has been eating this for the last 10 years, along with Sheba Perfect Portions, Fancy Feast chicken pate, Fancy Feast wild salmon broths. From time to time we buy a different flavor or brand and she would rather starve than eat the new stuff. I am glad Amazon still carries this, because Petco and Petsmart don't sell it. I know they are trying to push "healthier" options but my cat won't be healthy if she refuses to eat. This is the only dry food (and only this flavor) that my mom's cat ate and that cat lived to 20 without ever visiting the vet. I can't argue with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great cat treats, much cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats are rotten and constantly want treats, which are really expensive. I bought this dry food, which they have never eaten, and put it into the treat container. They LOVE it! Originally, I got the 3 pound bag of this from a local store for $7.38. 1 pound of their old treats was about $7 per pound. Huge difference! This saves a good bit of money for us. From now on, I'll just order the big bag from Amazon. 😁
customer_reviews.author: denise blount

customer_reviews.title: They like it!
customer_reviews.text: I give my guys a forever changing menu, but some items are better received than others. Some products I’ll only get once - and some get returned - but This dry Fancy Feast is one of the choices they like best. Most cat food flavors are poultry or seafood. The beef in this was attractive to me because it presented an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Foxmore

customer_reviews.title: Just an average cat food
customer_reviews.text: This is just an average cat food. Definitely not premium. Flavor-wise, it doesn't live up to the "Fancy Feast" brand. My cats like this and will eat it, but not more than other ordinary dry foods. The pieces come in several shapes: stars, crescent moons, diamonds, hearts. Overall, they are about 10 mm by 5 mm by 3 mm. Small enough for my cat who doesn't have teeth, but some pieces are pointy, which might be irritating. The bag could be better. Not easy to open and not re-sealable. The bag doesn't have calorie content written on it. Purina's website states "471 kcal/cup". Higher than average. Ingredients are suspect. Artificial flavors and food coloring.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Eat This Up!
customer_reviews.text: I rotate my cats' dry cat food because they will love love love something, then go meh later on. However, while this one is sometimes so not the favorite of the four dry food bowls I set out for them, it's been a perennial, never the last bowl eaten. My cats are healthy, shiny, and spoiled rotten so looks like this food is good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Legend

customer_reviews.title: Cats loved it
customer_reviews.text: I have two former feral cats (10+ years) who are finicky eaters! I change food each bag b/c these interlopers are picky. Go figure. So, every time I order, I pick a different bag/brand. They LOVED this Fancy Feast. Ate with gusto. My only con is that it was a small bag and didn't last long, but trust me, it will back in the rotation soon.
customer_reviews.author: 50 State Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with this food.
customer_reviews.text: We have used Fancy feast for years and this bag made our cats very sick. Im not sure what they did but it even had a different color to the food. It took a few days until we realized it was the food making the cats sick. After they ate it they would puke it up. I bought another bag and the some thing happened. They manufacturer must have changed something. After doing a little research I noticed we werent the only ones with sick cats. Please dont buy. We have switched foods and they are slowly getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Pezewski

customer_reviews.title: Cat's favorite dry food by far, even more so than "treat" style cat eats.
customer_reviews.text: Have out all day for cat to snack on. Keep certain amount out or cat would gorge on it. Great for cat's teeth. Cat's need crunchy food too. This is a huge favorite; cat likes it better than any "cat treats"--that's saying a LOT.
customer_reviews.author: SacoFamily2

customer_reviews.title: SICK CATS FROM THIS FOOD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Fancy Feast was making all of my cats sick I think it may have been all the artificial coloring that is used. My cats do well on the Fancy Feast canned but not on this dry so I switched to Purina Beyond Natural Limited Ingredient Dry Cat Food, Simply Salmon & Whole Brown Rice Recipe and they are doing well on it. None of them have vomited since switching. Fancy Feast needs to ditch the artificial colors that make so many cats ill.
customer_reviews.author: aiv

customer_reviews.title: My cat really likes this ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat stopped eating his dry food a few years ago because he became spoiled with the moist stuff in the cans. I decided, it’s time again to have something that could sit out in a bowl without spoiling so I set out on a quest for something he will eat. After buying about 7 small trial bags of various kinds of dry food- my cat chose this one. He gets excited when it’s being poured into his bowl. I don’t know how nutritious is actually is but he really, really likes it so I’m buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Nondescript

customer_reviews.title: purchased after Hills Science Diet light changed their recipe...
customer_reviews.text: when Science Diet changed their shape and recipe without notice on the package, my cat threw up and then refused to eat it. i tried many, many brands unsuccessfully; both my cat and i were getting quite frustrated. finally a friend gave me a sample of this product. my cat loves eat and does not get sick. the only problem i have is that the 7lb bag does not have a resealable opening the same as the 3lb bag; i have to use a large binder clip to close it between servings.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R Lerner

customer_reviews.title: If Your Cat Eats One Cat Food, You Go Out and Find It!
customer_reviews.text: I have one young cat that WILL NOT eat the food eaten by the other three cats - she only wants the Filet Mignon Fancy Feast - as I do love her little recalcitrant body I was a bit disturbed when my local stores suddenly had a problem getting it during the pandemic - was very grateful to find it on Amazon and though it was a bit more than I usually pay for it, it was worth not having to go through the expense of trying to find another cat food she would eat - I was just very grateful it was available.
customer_reviews.author: Paula E Shubat

customer_reviews.title: Made my cats super sick
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats threw up this food and this is what I normally buy them at the store so i dont know if it was old or had gone bad in the heat of a truck maybe?? but I dont even want to go through the trouble of returning it but I wont be buying it again online.
customer_reviews.author: InannaIshtar

customer_reviews.title: It's like I have a new cat!
customer_reviews.text: I fed my cat the same food for about 7 years until he got an infection out of the blue. The vet recommended switching him to this food and he's like a completely different cat now. His fur is softer and cleaner and he has more energy. Unfortunately, we've since added another cat to the mix and this food doesn't seem to agree with his stomach. I do highly recommend this food unless your cat has a super sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Emily.heb

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast Strikes Again!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats really, really like this dry food. I've always had cats in my life and never have they been interested in eating the same dry food more than one or two bags worth. If they're happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: walksoftly9

customer_reviews.title: 5 Cats Give It A 10!
customer_reviews.text: Well liked. I free feed and bag goes a long way. No hair balls since eating this. Cats love the taste and when I top off the feeding tray they arrive to see what the action is. At least two snack a bit. I also notice no allergy type side effects. Some of the cats are quite Senior and chewing goes well. This is a really good food and they like it best of all!! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: labrador mom

customer_reviews.title: Cats didn’t like this but that doesn’t mean it’s bad.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 elderly cats who are 17,18,and 19 years old didn’t like this. They’ll eat the canned food but not FF dry. BUT they are very fussy eaters. I decided to try another Purina brand called one. I had better luck with that. Purina is a great brand and they do they’re research. Please don’t buy blue buffalo. Reads reviews online and you’ll see why. ALWAYS DO YOUR RESEARCH!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Only cat food my finicky cat will eat, love the huge size and seal for after its open
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing my finicky cat will eat and our local grocery stores only carry small pouches. This is huge and we don't have to run to the grocery store every few days for more cat food! The bottom of the bag is nice and wide, so we've never had it tip over. It also comes with a seal to use after its been open. I'm so thankful that Amazon carried this cat food in a huge size!
customer_reviews.author: lisajotheshoppinghoTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Senior kitties need their Fancy Feast - also a great treat for picky eaters.
customer_reviews.text: When one of our seniors doesn't eat as well as they should we try everything and I mean anything and everything. We found that this food usually gets them eating again. In addition our other kitties love it too and we now use it as a treat, we keep a little jar and sprinkle some when ever we want to give them something special (should i say they DEMAND!). So much cheaper than traditional treats.
customer_reviews.author: I think the Cat's Gone Mad!

customer_reviews.title: They love it.  All I feel is guilt.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I'm a terrible cat mom and feed my cats this crap. Why? They love it. I have one cat that will go without eating for days if I don't provide this stuff to her. Ugh. Yes, it's the equivalent of feeding my cats ding dongs for breakfast but, at least they are happy I guess. I love being able to get this huge bag sent right to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Sharis

customer_reviews.title: cats love it
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find a dry cat food all of my cats could agree on. Most liked Iams, but only the kitten food which is too high in calorie to feed adult cats. After many attempts with other products I found this. I tried all the flavors and the turkey and chicken was the winner. I have been using it for a couple of months and they still love it. And nobody throws up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Quantity? Quality? Bueller?
customer_reviews.text: Same thing happened to me. Ordered 4, was sent one. Asked for a replacement order. Was sent one (1) more. I don't know what's happened with quality control, it used to be great, I'm having more & more problems lately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Willow loves her different flavors!
customer_reviews.text: My Willow loves all 3 of these flavors mixed with Sheba wet food. I try to give her as much variety as possible. So she doesn't get bored of the flavors. She fits right in with my daughter and I...we get tired of the same flavors all the time. So I mix differently as much as I can to make her happy. But now I don't think after spoiling her like this. She will ever just go to wet or just dry by itself.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eggert

customer_reviews.title: Cat's favorite--
customer_reviews.text: Fancy Feast Fish dry cat food (green package) is my cat's favorite food. They get other choices but this is the one they choose the most--I put out at least 3 varieties of food for them to choose from. The vet says this probably isn't the most nutritious but I feed them what they will eat. I have tried Science Diet and Royal Canin (my vet's favorite) and the cats turn their noses up at it. So, I give the cats what they want.
customer_reviews.author: R T

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get and very pricey even though my cats love it :(
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this flavor but why is it so hard to get now?? Why is the price escalating?! All flavors are. I had to give up on this flavor. Much lower in Walmart. Gouging shouldn’t be ok...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats 2nd favorite food.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the same price as in stores -- only the local stores no longer sell the 7lb. Bag, and only carry the 3lb. Bag, which is a little more costly. One star off "flavor" because it is my cats 2nd favorite food. They like the poultry flavor better, but also like the variety option.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin11

customer_reviews.title: TWO CATS WHO AGREE TO IGNORE IT AFTER ONE TRY!
customer_reviews.text: They LOVE the Purina Fancy Feast Savory Chicken and Turkey. Both cats took to this as I opened the package, trying to put it in the bowl. They fussed until I held some in each hand for them to try. Delighted to find something liked well enough to order continuously. It's worth it to have happy cats who graze contentedly. I appreciate the feeding size help on the package. I leave the food out during the day until an hour before dinner and leave it out for overnight. So far they are eating an appropriate amount which makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Only the best for our Billy Bob
customer_reviews.text: Billy Bob gets IAMS and Fancy Feast, and it seems to be a nice balance for him. He likes both. He has always preferred the chicken flavored Fancy Feast. It's one of his faves.
customer_reviews.author: HobbitLovr in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: THe best Catfood ever...says my kitty
customer_reviews.text: Cosette has been eating this brand and flavor for years now and she is pretty finicky so I believe it's her absolute favorite...even smells good enough to eat for me too...but I won't do that! The price on Amazon can't be beat so if you're considering buying don't bother shopping around. Save some time and get it here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats will have to vouch for the flavor and freshness, because no, I haven't eaten this! This is the only crunchy food they will eat. Using the subscription service in this pandemic has been a huge help, especially when items in the store are sometimes not available.
customer_reviews.author: 'ol wingless

customer_reviews.title: I love this dry cat food
customer_reviews.text: First, I love this dry cat food! My cat had some digestive issues and his vet said that the food I was buying him didn't have enough fat an protein and suggested I get him the dry Fancy Feast food. However, it's so expensive and my grocery store only carried the smaller bags. I started buying this on Amazon two years ago and my cat is back to his healthy self and buying cat food is just a simple click away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cats seem to love this and have less hair balls
customer_reviews.text: My cats are very finicky and love this meow mix. Especially the beef. My cats don’t seem to have many hair balls anymore. I can’t tell you for sure if this food has anything to do with less hair balls but until they ate this food I was always cleaning them up. Since they’ve been eating this I’ve had none to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Newlaker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: this is such a great buy as opposed to in stores. A small bag at Albertsons is about $8-9. My kitty hijos love this so this is what they shall get. 1 of my kitty hijos looks similar to the kitty on the bag. Will continue to buy for my sons!
customer_reviews.author: Princesa L

customer_reviews.title: Cat's Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Fancy Feast Dry Cat Food for over two years to feed a wild cat that likes to hang out in our backyard. At first his coat was dull, and terrible looking.. after a few weeks of feeding him this brand of food his coat is as shiny as can be.. The Ocean White Fish is the one we started with, and then moved to this flavor. Both have been well received, and he seems to be thriving. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: PharmgirlSB

customer_reviews.title: Makes my cat happy
customer_reviews.text: Since this is cat food I have no idea how it tastes or if it is fresh. I know my cat likes the food and eats it. I have tried some of the dry cat food that is considered healthier, but he won’t eat them. He is a healthy 8 yr old kitty and he chose this food. Who can argue with a cat & win?
customer_reviews.author: MINA10708

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry cat food my cats will eat, and since it has been discontinued at the store I always shop at I have to go out of my way to other stores and there is no guarantee it will be in stock. It is a great relief to know I can get it here and the cats are very pleased and tummies are full
customer_reviews.author: Bet28

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY PLASTIC BAG
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this product and both times the bag was ripped in the center, it had a 6 inch slit in the very center...good thing it came inside a box so no loss of product happened. They should use a stronger bag for this product and I hope they will.
customer_reviews.author: kachito

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves This Food!
customer_reviews.text: My cat, who is not quite a year old, absolutely loves this food! She was introduced to it when one of my friends cat-sat for me one weekend. The only issue I had with it is how expensive it is to buy locally. I found this bag on Amazon with double the amount of food in it for only a few dollars more and couldn't wait to try it. It's exactly the same as what I found locally. Kallie loves this food so much that when I transfer it from the bag to a smaller, more easily manageable container, she tries to eat it as it's coming out of the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: I like that my cats like it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cat food all my cats agree on to eat. I wish it had healthier ingredients but it's definitely not the worst. My cats have been eating it for over 12 years. The largest bag I can buy locally is 7lbs but this one is 12lbs and cheaper. Will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Jo

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite food
customer_reviews.text: My two cats (and the fluffy red boy that visits our back porch) love this stuff! (The girls turn their noses up at most dry cat food.). Our local grocery doesn't carry the big bag and Walmart runs out. So this is easy and competitively priced.
customer_reviews.author: Owlmother

customer_reviews.title: Will wonders never cease?
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 17 years old. Loves her crunchy treats and wet food but has never eaten dry cat food. I decided to try this on my picky eater on a whim. In a stunning first, she LOVES it!! It's even possible she will finish the bag...
customer_reviews.author: thereismoretolife

customer_reviews.title: My cats only choice.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY food my cats choose to eat. With this Covid pandemic, it was hard to get for awhile and I purchased several different brands and my cats would not eat unless they were starving. So happy it's available again.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this food, but the ingredients leave a lot to be desired. Manufacturer must put some special coating or additive that appeals to cats. Yin is 17.5 years old and I bought this to see if she would eat more as she had lost weight. She is eating more and has more frequent and softer waste. I feel it is overpriced with all the fillers used. The main ingredients are rice and corn. I do not recommend this cat food. Purina Beyond is better.
customer_reviews.author: mattie73

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Been purchasing Purina Fancy Feast dry cat food for several years. Decent price and large bags. My cat doesn’t care for the ocean fish as much as some of the others though.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Shabino

customer_reviews.title: None of these valances are the same size!
customer_reviews.text: Each valance is a different size or shorter on one end and longer on the other. When hung they are not even! The color is okay, but I did expect them to be a bit brighter plum color. But I could live with the color if the curtains were made correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great cat chow but bag was torn
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars as the bag came with a tear in it. No, I didn't cut the bag when opening the box as the tear side was on the bottom of the box along with loose kibble. My cats will still eat it although they do prefer it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Pugs

customer_reviews.title: cat approved
customer_reviews.text: I have not personally tasted but my 4 cats give it the big thumbs up. beware, though, if you ever start you cat on this premium mix, they will never want to eat the cheaper kibble again
customer_reviews.author: Liz Byrd

customer_reviews.title: The best cat food ever!
customer_reviews.text: I switched brands because I thought I'd try something new. So I tried this product. My two-year-old cat is in love! He has had no digestive or any problems with it. It's his new favorite food! I would definitely recommend this to cat owner's.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about Fancy Feast dry food for cats, but my cats (all 9) just inhale this. I buy other brands as well, but the Fancy Feast goes down the fastest and it is most often eaten before the other brands I have in bowls. I buy all three flavors and wish the largest sacks weren't so expensive, but if my kitties love it this much, then it's the least I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they put in Fancy Feast cat food but my cat will only eat this kibble if I let him. He doesn't. He gets this as a treat at the end of the day. He waits by his bowl. I can set my clock to him.
customer_reviews.author: Tgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cat Eats It and that's good
customer_reviews.text: Finicky cat walks around different dry foods but will eat this one. However, beware, my cat will usually have a throw-up incident within a day or two of eating this food and it's in the reddish color of the food (very staining to the carpet). Sometimes a hairball and other times it's all food but I guess there's something made into these food pellets that lubricates his insides . Food arrived fast and fresh and all boxed up like fragile merchandise. Saved me a trip into the crazy traffic around the Pet Food store down the road.
customer_reviews.author: John Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: My Persian cat would roll with the punches and eat any food. My Siamese does not share his easy going nature...I have tried really fancy foods and he goes on hunger strikes, which we all know is dangerous for a cat. After finding this food my picky cat never misses a meal!
customer_reviews.author: Customer York PA

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it but then they throw up all around the house
customer_reviews.text: I guess the title summarizes well what I don't like about this cat food. My cats eat it and puke all around. I clean at least one puke a day.
customer_reviews.author: enginxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Gives cats the runs
customer_reviews.text: My cat suffers from IBS and this food gives him the runs. I had to throw the whole bag out. He was yelping in pain sitting on the couch from the gas it caused. Not buying it again
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Actually, my Cats love it, not me!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a cat three years ago who was a captured stray. His "Foster" mother fed him the Ocean Fish and Salmon combo when she brought him in and he took a liking to it. I have tried other varieties, beef for example, of the same brand, but that was not well received. A year later I adopted another stray and she took to it just as well and had the same adversion to the beef. Neither cat is overweight or unhealthy. I leave their food bowl out all day as my vet believes grazing in small portions throughout the day is better than scoffing down a bowl full of food in one feeding.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: My clients cats Rose-Bud and Pattie-Cake APPROVE! Actually they always have and they’re very specific to the food they eat and this is it; Fancy Feast Gourmet. I usually pick it up in store for her but it’s too costly in our small town. So where else do I buy my products for the best price, Amazon! Thank you for always making my life just a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Never been recalled
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that Fancy Feast has NEVER had any recalls! Especially since it’s been around awhile now! I feel good about feeding this to all for of my cats and they all like this flavor
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: My cats approve.
customer_reviews.text: Since my cats tend to be picky, its just a matter of how picky your cats can be. Sometimes cheap products are ok with them but sometimes they are not. It depends on the cats themselves.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Price got to high.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good and have cats used to it, but the price has gone from 14.95 to 20.00 and now 24.00. why I really feel that this to high. Also heard they have stop production. Very unhappy,
customer_reviews.author: JustLukin

customer_reviews.title: You can find what you want at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I notice the whitefish with fresh green accents is getting harder to find and my pussy enjoys variety! Can you imagine eating the same thing every day? Anyway I can always count on Amazon to provide access to so much of what makes all of us happy
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Purrkids approved.
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is hard to find in my local grocery stores, and it's a favorite of my Purrkids. Good value size with an equally good price. Arrived on time in excellent condition, and reasonably fresh.
customer_reviews.author: soloangel58

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite of 1 of my 3 Cats
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats loves this...the other two turn up their noses at it. I'm not sure I always understand why cats are so persnickity...but I go with their choices!
customer_reviews.author: Old Doc

customer_reviews.title: Over priced but what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It was not available for a while in stores but was finally able to order it on Amazon. It was quite a bit more than I normally pay as you can see above. So overpriced or not, my cat loves it so I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Sticky products
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I saw the prudutc very sticky. I don't know what is the problem, just hoping that it's not mold because I fed my cats with the products. It feels like the food is mixed with glue. The food was sticked to my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Fozieh Najafian

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Could not find this size in store..so i was super excited i found it here. This cat food is fairly new and only came in small sizes at store. It came fresh and it is good size for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: My cats like dry Fancy Feast
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. Also the ocean fish flavor. It's not the cheapest nor the most expensive.
customer_reviews.author: davidissimo

customer_reviews.title: The Fancy Feast brand is my four cats' favorite food. The winning flavor is Filet Mignon and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Fancy Feast brand is my four cats' favorite food. The winning flavor is Filet Mignon and second is Savory Chicken & Turkey.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Is the bag recyclable or do I have to change brands
customer_reviews.text: My 5 cats love it but are the bags it comes in recyclable?
customer_reviews.author: brenda rogers

customer_reviews.title: The quality is Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review because my cats got very sick from the 12lb bag of filet mignon cat food. I am very disappointed with the quality of this product. Because, I have feed this cat food to my cats for years with no problems. I’m not sure why the quality of the 12lb bag of filet mignon cat food is so bad. I will not be purchasing this item ever again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon W.

customer_reviews.title: For some reason, my cats LOVE this particular flavor of Fancy Feast!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure Fancy Feast isn't the MOST NUTRITIOUS food in the world (I have many much more expensive foods) but my cats LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharman L. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: My cat had been on this for 2 1/2 yrs then Vet put him on the special DM good and after 6mo he had bowels that got too loose. So I bought this again for him. He loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. Kalinosky

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Kitties Are Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitties, all nine of them, love this cat food! We mix it in with Meow Mix Tender Centers Chicken to stretch the value!
customer_reviews.author: Krullstone LLC

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: Not so much that I love it -since it is fairly expensive and hard to find in stock anywhere, but this is like Cat Crack and my four cats absolutely love it. I have stopped buying cat treats and use this as my cat treats. It is cheaper than treats and I know the cats will eat every piece I put out. Other than this food, my cats eat grain free due to one with pancreatitis and one with allergies to certain grains. Both of my special needs cats can eat this with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Coleman Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product was not fresh at all. There was a greasy residue on the food and the food was very sticky as of liquid has seeped into the package. My cat hardly touched the food.
customer_reviews.author: Davina N. Sewkumar

customer_reviews.title: Food too hard for my cat teeth.
customer_reviews.text: The food is too hard. It is so hard I can hear my cat trying to chew it, when I am two rooms away from where he is eating. I think it might be stale. I will not buy again. I have to purchase a different brand quickly. I am afraid my cat is going to break a tooth. My cat looks like he has lost weight due to the difficulty he is experiencing eating this brand.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA WESTON

customer_reviews.title: My Cat's Favorite Food
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this just before everyone was out of stock on almost everything. My cat loves this food and this size will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Wallye

customer_reviews.title: Artificial color and flavor???
customer_reviews.text: It has artificial flavor and color! WHAT??? But this is Max's fave. I am trying to exchange this with a natural alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: My cat highly approves!
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps she is just getting picky with age but suddenly our 8 year old cat decided she no longer liked the dry food shes had her whole life... after trying a good 5 different brands FINALLY she ate this one and just loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Brp1016

customer_reviews.title: What Spooky gets
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My cat loves this. Pieces aren't too big and flavor is great. I also like that greens are used. I feel my cat is getting better nutrients this way.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Moms cats love it
customer_reviews.text: She has trouble getting out of the house to buy her cat food. I looked on Chewy.com and other food delivery sites, but Amazon was best price, no shipping cost. Cats happy, Mom Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Meow: the yummiest
customer_reviews.text: My kitty told me meow meow meow... translation: this is his favorite food. We’ve tried others but always end up back here.
customer_reviews.author: Customer ID 783

customer_reviews.title: Product good place carrier left it bad !!!
customer_reviews.text: Box was not left at deck it was in front of my closed garage door !!! Bad could have been run over !!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food 😋
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this cat food.They hated 9 lives so I tried this and never going back to the other one. If your cats love treats then get this and they'll eat less treats.
customer_reviews.author: Rica

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this dry cat food
customer_reviews.text: My cat Zorro, who is fussy about what he eats, loves this dry cat food to which he has free access. Zorro also eats one small can of Purina Fancy Feast creamy wet cat food (seafood flavor with a touch of milk) every day. He loves both and seems to thrive on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food!
customer_reviews.text: My cats will eat this but no other food. I can’t find this in stores so ordering online has been great. I like the biggest sized bag. Please keep offering it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele A Husby

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my cat hates the large bag of Fancy Feast. She loves the little bags so I wonder if the formula or taste is different.
customer_reviews.author: TamBerine:

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our outside kitty will only eat his Fancy Feast... loves it! Go for the 12 lb bag... excellent value. Much cheaper than individual bags at the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: kulumusic

customer_reviews.title: Sliced bag and replacement.
customer_reviews.text: The bag had a big slice in the side of it so the food was all over the box. It look like it was cut with a box knife. Amazon is replacing it so that I appreciate! Ty.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My cats Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this even though their senior cats they seem to be able to chew this even though they are lacking in teeth
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

product_meta.title: Purina Fancy Feast Adult Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Food| Flavor Name:Chicken & Turkey| Size:12 lb. BagSatisfy your cat's cravings for gourmet meals with Purina Fancy Feast Gourmet Dry Cat Food With Savory Chicken & Turkey. Crisp morsels, lightly cooked and basted, offer the crunchy texture to please her palate, and the savory combination of real chicken and turkey flavors delivers the taste cats love. Essential vitamins and minerals in every serving support your cat's overall health and wellness, so you can feel confident she's getting the perfect balance of taste and nutrition every time you fill her dish. With a high-quality recipe and delicious ingredients, this gourmet dry cat food lets you show your favorite feline just how important she is to you. She's sure to come running as she hears the crunchy bites hit her bowl, and rest easy knowing she's getting 100% complete and balanced nutrition for adult cats backed by a brand you can trust. For a variety your cat is sure to adore, along with the convenience and quality you love, order Purina Fancy Feast Gourmet dry cat food today.
feature_bullets: 100% Complete And Balanced Adult Cat Nutrition
Provides Essential Vitamins And Minerals To Help Support Feline Health
12 Lb. Bag - Purina Fancy Feast With Savory Chicken & Turkey Dry Cat Food

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
